name: Responsive
intro: Having a responsive website means it will function on a range of devices: mobile, tablet, desktop, etc.

name: Accessibility
intro: Making your web pages accessibile is key to making sure all your users are able to use it.

name: Forms
intro: Collecting user input is done with forms and is commonly used to send data to a server for processing.

name: Documentation
intro: It is important to keep your code well documented so it's easy for you and others to understand how it works.

name: Architecture
intro: Having a well thought out architecture makes it easy to split out files and find them when you need to.

name: Sass
intro: Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets. One of the most popular preprocessors for CSS.

name: Typography
intro: There are many typeface options out there and choosing the right ones for your website is key for creating the best reading experience.
